SEARCH
Package com.butlert.tradingcardmanager.service

Class CardServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.butlert.tradingcardmanager.service.CardServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
CardService
@Service @Transactional public class CardServiceImpl extends Object implements CardService
Implementation of the CardService interface containing business logic for managing cards in the Trading Card Manager application.

This service handles validation, mapping, statistics, and value calculations, and acts as the main logic layer between the controller and the repository.

Author: Timothy Butler
Course: CEN 3024 - Software Development 1
Date: June 18, 2025

    • CardServiceImpl

      public CardServiceImpl(CardRepository cardRepository, CardParser cardParser, ReadTextFile readTextFile, CardValidator cardValidator, @Qualifier("resourceHandlerMapping") org.springframework.web.servlet.HandlerMapping resourceHandlerMapping)
      Constructs a CardServiceImpl with all required dependencies for card operations.
      Parameters:
      cardRepository - the repository used to access card data
      cardParser - utility for parsing cards from raw input
      readTextFile - utility for reading text file contents
      cardValidator - validates card data before persistence
      resourceHandlerMapping - Spring MVC handler mapping, injected by qualifier

  • Method Details

    • addCard

      public Optional<CardDTO> addCard(CardDTO cardDTO)
      Adds a new card to the repository if it does not already exist. Validates the card before saving.
      Specified by:
      addCard in interface CardService
      Parameters:
      cardDTO - the card data to add
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the created CardDTO, or empty if the card already exists
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if validation fails

    • deleteCard

      public boolean deleteCard(int cardId)
      Deletes a card by its card number.
      Specified by:
      deleteCard in interface CardService
      Parameters:
      cardId - the card number of the card to delete
      Returns:
      true if the card was deleted, false if it did not exist

      updateCard in interface CardService
      Parameters:
      cardNumber - the number of the card to update

    • calculateCollectionStatistics

      public Map<String,Object> calculateCollectionStatistics()
      Calculates statistics on the card collection, including: - Total spent - Total cards - Foiled card count - Percentage of foiled cards
      Specified by:
      calculateCollectionStatistics in interface CardService
      Returns:
      a map containing statistical keys and their corresponding values

    • calculateCollectionValues

      public Map<String,BigDecimal> calculateCollectionValues()
      Calculates the total market and owner value of all cards in the collection. Value adjustments are based on rarity and time since purchase/publication.
      Specified by:
      calculateCollectionValues in interface CardService
      Returns:
      a map containing "marketValue" and "ownerValue" totals

    • addAllCardsFromFile

      public List<Card> addAllCardsFromFile(org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file)
      Imports multiple cards from a provided text file. Each line is parsed and validated; valid cards are saved and added to the system.
      Specified by:
      addAllCardsFromFile in interface CardService
      Parameters:
      file - the uploaded file containing card data
      Returns:
      a list of successfully imported Card entities
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the file cannot be read
